metadata.title: CVE-2013-7445 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: The Direct Rendering Manager (DRM) subsystem in the Linux kernel through 4.x mishandles requests for Graphics Execution Manager (GEM) objects, which allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via an application that processes graphics data, as demonstrated by JavaScript code that creates many CANVAS elements for rendering by Chrome or Firefox.

notes.note: sbeattie> no progress by upstream on fixing this.
